Title: Bring every positive factor into play, correctly handle contradictions among the people
Designer: Students and Teachers from the Central Industrial Arts College (中央工艺美术学院师生集体)
Publisher: Tianjin meishu chubanshe (天津美术出版社)
Notes: The book is Mao's On the Correct Handling of Contradictions among the People (关于正确处理人民内部矛盾的问题, Guanyu zhengque chuli renmin neibu maodun de wenti), first published in 1957.
Tags: On the Correct Handling of Contradictions among the People
关于正确处理人民内部矛盾的问题
